scripts.test: npm run clean && lerna run --parallel test
scripts.postinstall: lerna exec --parallel 'npm install' && lerna bootstrap && lerna run build
scripts.publish: lerna publish && lerna-changelog --tag-from=v0.0.23 > CHANGELOG.md && git reset && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'docs(changelog): update to latest version' && git push
